name: anti virus (thats the name of the game)
name_original: anti virus (thats the name of the game)
description:
in this game you play as an atom defending the body from a virus.  everytime the counter on top reaches 20   you will get an other atom to help you. i recommend leaving as soon as you get to 20 the first time bc the second time will hurt your ears a lot. i didnt take this jam seriously at all but i was working on it for 2 days so i am uploading it. 

controls" W  and A
